page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: The farms in my area are mainly {grassland.} Some are beef and sheep farms. Some crops are grown but most are for feeding the animals in winter. {There are not many very big farms. The land is mostly good farmland used for growning grass and crops on for the animals to eat. Most of the water troughs around this area are plumbed in but there are a few which need filling by hosepipe. Some of the slurry pits are not safe because they do not have bars around the sides of them. The farm houses are not normally very big. Some of the farmhouses have hooks hanging from the ceiling which meat was hung on years ago.
